entry.title: Troubled Waters
entry.summary:
Author: Baileyloves911

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 15,790Chapters: 6/?Kudos: 24

Summary: Buck’s phone buzzes again and he checks it and winces.“if you’re with someone else, just say it but i know you still love me.”“Oh come on!”Buck practically yells.Eddie walks behind Buck angrily just in time to see the message.Without a warning he snatches the phone right out of Buck’s hand.“Eddie!”Buck yells lunging up from the couch“Give it back!”But Eddie’s already typing with his knuckles are white.“If this guy doesn’t understand boundaries, then he can deal with me.”“Eddie seriou-““No”Eddie shoots him a look.“You shouldn’t have to deal with this crap. He doesn’t get to haunt you like this.”He finishes typing and tosses the phone back.Buck stares at the screen.“This is Eddie I said leave Buck alone dude. Don’t text him again.”Buck blinks as he reads the text“Well that’s..direct”

entry.title: take only what you need
entry.summary:
Author: oneofthesirens

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 4,321Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 5

Summary: “It doesn’t have to be anything serious,” Buck quickly adds. He feels like a kid negotiating with their parents for an extra toy. He’s throwing out any idea that might land. “We can be like…friends with benefits.” “Friends with benefits?” Eddie repeats. He places his hands on his hips, his biceps bulging with the motion, and Buck’s cock gives a valiant attempt at being noticed by twitching in his boxers. Jesus. Buck might not survive this. or: to stop Eddie from dating, Buck suggests becoming friends with benefits instead.

entry.title: Fighting To Hold On
entry.summary:
Author: untoldchaos

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 21,097Chapters: 4/8Kudos: 29

Summary: Evan 'Buck' Buckley doesn't think of himself as a violent person. He forgets to remind himself of this fact as he draws his fist back and then hooks it around to strike his opponent. The returning blows come as a flurry of movement. First comes the impact, then a tingling sensation, and finally a throbbing pain radiating from Buck's jaw up to his temple and through his entire skull. He stumbles back; vision hazy, the faint metallic taste of blood in his mouth. Another hit lands before he has a chance to re-orientate himself, sending him falling backwards- hard. OrEddie has left for El Paso, so Buck needs a new hobby to keep distracted.Baking won't cut it.The solution is beginner MMA, obviously.And to make things more interesting, Buck's trainer shares a striking resemblance to his best friend.

entry.title: Rules Are Made To Be Broken
entry.summary:
Author: eulogizebuck

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 3,872Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 35

Summary: “Rule number one; it’ll be just for the weekend. On Monday we’re back to being best friends and roommates,” Eddie started.Buck hesitates for a second, looking into Eddie’s eyes before looking away. “Of course.”Eddie continued. “Two. Keep it casual! No over-the-top PDA. No kissing. Holding hands is fine.”Buck nodded.“And three. I-i think…we should use pet names.”“Eddie,” Buck objected, giving him a glare.Eddie bit his lip, holding back a laugh. Somehow, he knew Buck would object on the last one. “It’ll make it more convincing,” Eddie shrugged.Buck pressed his lips together and raised an eyebrow. A minute of silence goes by.“Fine! But no ‘buttercup’ or ‘gumdrop’.”Eddie snorted. “I would never call you that, Buck.” OR: When Eddie’s parents come to stay for the weekend, Eddie has to pretend he’s dating Buck.Cue fake dating, setting ground rules and lots of awkward situations!But rules are made to be broken, right?

entry.title: the earth from a distance (see how it shines)
entry.summary:
Author: buckyjerkbarnes

Rating: Not RatedLanguage: EnglishWords: 10,668Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 105

Summary: “None of this is fair,” he says. “None of it. You two… you understand each other in a way no one else on the team does. You deserved the chance to say goodbye, and I’m so sorry you didn’t get that, Eddie. But you can never know when one time will become the last time. You can’t blame yourself. Not for that.”Eddie’s stare flicks up from the table. The bit of label he’d managed to pick off clings to his thumb nail.“How are you so level-headed right now?”“...what?”“It’s not an insult,” Eddie says. Shakes himself in a way that must knock a few pieces into place, as his hand covers Buck’s and locks their fingers together. "You were ready to jump off the roof when Bobby was advising on Hotshots, and now you're...""What?" Buck repeats, at a great distance. It's the only way he can keep speaking. "Not what?"Eddie's chin tips down. "Buck." They're gonna need you. "I'm okay, Eddie." [An 8x16 fix-it.]

entry.title: Flames and Fervor
entry.summary:
Author: NN4txx

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 3,042Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 101

Summary: As summer draws to a close, the 118 firefighters volunteer at a community safety fair in Los Angeles Memorial Park, where Evan "Buck" Buckley becomes the inadvertent center of attention. Between demonstrating rescue techniques and charming kids at the bucket brigade, Buck’s easy charisma draws flirtatious smiles and lingering touches from admirers all afternoon—much to Eddie Diaz’s silent, seething frustration. Eddie’s simmering jealousy boils over as he glares, hovers, and accidentally-on-purpose interrupts every conversation Buck has with overly friendly strangers, leaving Hen Wilson thoroughly entertained by his possessive antics. When a bold parent crosses one too many lines, Eddie’s carefully guarded feelings spill out in a heated moment, forcing both men to confront the tension that’s burned between them for years.

entry.title: PTA-ndemonium (or, How Eddie Diaz Realized He Was Jealous of a Bake Sale)
entry.summary:
Author: dugoutcookie

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 4,496Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 136

Summary: Eddie Diaz has mastered the art of PTA avoidance—attend the bare minimum, buy the overpriced fundraiser swag, and ignore the judgmental side-eyes from helicopter parents. But when Buck, the human golden retriever masquerading as his best friend, accidentally becomes the entire school’s favorite person (and dream date), Eddie’s carefully cultivated indifference crumbles.Between rocket-building workshops, viral car wash dances, and a very enthusiastic bachelor raffle proposal, Eddie finds himself in a losing battle against the PTA’s collective crush on Buck. The problem?Buck is oblivious, Christopher is Team Chaos, and Eddie is definitely not panicking about how much he wants to claim Buck as his. Cue jealousy-fueled supply closet confessions, meddling PTA moms with a front-row seat to the drama, and the mortifying realization that love might just be a middle school science fair away.(Or: 5 times Eddie tried to protect Buck from the PTA, and 1 time he realized he was the one who needed protecting.)

Summary: When Buck accidentally becomes Christopher’s emergency contact at school, a misunderstanding spirals into a running joke—then an ache he can’t ignore. Between grocery store “date nights,” hardware store newlywed discounts, and Abuela’s not-so-subtle hints, Eddie leans into the charade with a smirk and a storm of heart-eyed emojis. But when playful denial turns to breathless confession, Buck realizes the line between co-parents and soulmates was never as blurry as he pretended. entry.title: Serendipity
entry.summary:
Author: bluegreen_118

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 45,221Chapters: 26/?Kudos: 142

Summary: Evan “Buck” Buckley and his older sister Maddie were adopted by firefighter captain Bobby Nash and his retired cop wife Athena Grant. Buck grew up hard of hearing as long as he could remember. To communicate he speaks and uses American Sign Language, and his sister is completely deaf she only uses American Sign Language.*Eddie Diaz grew up in Texas but when he gets in a car wreck his wife passes away and their five year old son loses his hearing. Eddie found a school for the deaf in Los Angeles. With that he packs their bags and moves to LA.*What happens when two walks of life meet?

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 14,934Chapters: 3/4Kudos: 43

Summary: prompt: "why are you avoiding me?!""Because I can't have you. I'm forcing myself to keep away. Starving myself of you because I'm not good enough. Even though all I want... all I need is for you to run into my arms. I have to keep my distance"
